basics.name: Davor Vukadin
basics.label: PhD | Explainable AI Researcher at FER

work.name: FER
work.summary: Researching attribution methods in XAI, developing evaluation metrics, and assessing human-model alignment using LLM-based techniques.

work.name: KVIKI MIC
work.summary: Led development of AI applications including multi-agent systems, chatbots, semantic search engines, explainable models, and forecasting tools for public and private sectors.

work.name: Elixirr Digital
work.summary: Developed monitoring systems for LLM drift, automated fine-tuning pipelines, and mentored students on NLP, LangChain, and LLMs during the Elixirr Digital summer academy.

work.name: ScanDoc AI d.o.o.
work.summary: Built OCR and segmentation models for identity documents and optimized transformer-based models using ONNX for production deployment.

work.name: FER
work.summary: Focused on explainable AI and software bug prediction; introduced novel Transformer-based explanation techniques and taught courses on data science and programming.

work.name: DataBlast d.o.o.
work.summary: Implemented resume parsers, job-matching models, ID document extraction systems, and forecasting models for national energy infrastructure.

work.name: TakeLab FER
work.summary: Developed a news crawler system and used NLP for information extraction and summarization.

work.name: Ericsson Nikola Tesla d.d.
work.summary: Built object recognition using DNNs on robotic arms and explored adversarial examples and misclassification reasoning.

work.name: Combis d.o.o.
work.summary: Developed scripts to manage firewall rules and user permissions via Ansible; built Django-based web interfaces.

education.summary: Deep Learning Model Interpretability by Evaluating Relevance Maps

volunteer.organization: Center for the Culture of Dialogue - CeKaDe Rijeka
volunteer.summary: STEM workshop organisation for children living in suboptimal social and economic conditions
